title: Future Gemstone skins
body: Since we just got an update on future prestige skins because of players not knowing to save or spend their points. Can we get a similar update on gem stone skins? Like wise I've had 10 for a while now not knowing to spend them or not, and gemstones are arguably harder to obtain. Would be extremely helpful. Thanks!

replies.body:
I couldn’t agree more.

Especially seeming there have been ‘limited time’ gemstone skins in the past _(Neo Pax Sivir)._

I feel uneasy having less than 10 gemstones sitting in my inventory, just incase a ‘limited time’ Swain or Azir etc. skin pops up.  And the only other way to get it is to drop several hundred on chests _(or buy a plane ticket to America for Pax or whatever event is linked to the skin)_ neither option is really a possibility.
